name: Star Wars: Super Bombad Racing
synopsis: Take the high-speed turns, crazy jumps and wild gadgets of bigheaded cart racing, jumble it with the gravity-defying hyperspaced pace of Star Wars, and you've got a racing game with an entirely new edge! As one of eight highly stylized Star Wars personalities, you'll zip through a galaxy of locations zapping your friends and beating your opponents in an all out free-for-all filled with crazy powerups, big air jumps, and even a few surprises!
